mapper.select: SELECT id, name, address, latitude, longitude, open_24h AS open24h, disabled, free, management_org AS managementOrg, ( 6371000 * acos( cos(radians(#{lat})) * cos(radians(latitude)) * cos(radians(longitude) - radians(#{lng})) + sin(radians(#{lat})) * sin(radians(latitude)) ) ) AS distance FROM restrooms HAVING distance <= #{radius} ORDER BY distance ASC LIMIT 20
